projects.title: House Mate
projects.description: The replacement for the several apps that I use on a daily base that donâ€™t keep my data private, such as Google calendar and keep notes, and a meal and calorie tracker such as MyFitnessPal. The goal is to build a platform that can be opened to the community and improved while keeping all data as private as possible. In the long run I would like to also implement photos backup functionality and an online interface to what the backed up photos and movies
